outcome.title: Geometric Optimization
outcome.description: Sketch the feasible region of a linear optimization problem and identify the optimal solution geomtrically.

outcome.title: Simplex Pivots
outcome.description: Identify valid pivot positions in a tableau and be able to perform a simplex pivot.

outcome.title: Simplex Algorithm for Feasible Canonical Problems
outcome.description: Find the optimal solution for feasible canonical problem.

outcome.title: Unboundedness
outcome.description: Determine when a tableau indicates either an unbounded feasible region and/or unbounded objective function.

outcome.title: Simplex Algorithm for Unbounded Problems
outcome.description: Identify when the objective function for a linear optimization problem with unbounded feasible region still has an optimal solution.

outcome.title: Feasibility
outcome.description: Determine when a tableau indicates either an unbounded feasible region and/or unbounded objective function.

outcome.title: Simplex Algorithm for Infeasible Problems
outcome.description: Determine via the simplex algorithm whether a problem with infeasible basic solution has an empty feasible region or not.

outcome.title: Solving Linear Optimization Problems
outcome.description: Given a linear optimization problem, either solve it or determine if it is infeasible or unbounded.

outcome.title: Unconstrained Variables
outcome.description: Convert a noncanonical linear optimization problem with unconstrained variables into a canonical problem.

outcome.title: Equality Constraints
outcome.description: Convert a noncanonical linear optimization problem with equality constraints into a canonical problem.
